summary: An Ordinance providing for the laying off, widening, altering and establishing of North Fifty-first Street, North Fifty-second Street, and North Fifty-fourth Street, each from Interlake Avenue to Woodlawn Avenue, all in the City of Seattle; and providing for the condemnation, appropriation, taking and damaging of land and other property necessary therefor; and providing that the payment for such improvement be made by special assessment upon property specially benefited, in the manner provided by law.
